title: meshc
summary: Render a wireframe surface with contour lines projected onto the base plane.

gpu_support.notes: Single-precision gpuArrays reuse the shared WebGPU context; other inputs gather.

description: `meshc(X, Y, Z)` draws a wireframe mesh and overlays contour lines on the XY plane.
gpu_behavior: Single-precision gpuArrays stream directly into the shared WebGPU renderer.
Double precision falls back to host gathers until SHADER_F64 is available.
